subject: OK, Now what? Help!
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi All, Well, it took longer than 10 minutes to pull the Mute pin . . .  or should I say, after moving it back & forth a bit, it broke off! Oh, well, I got it off! Then after I put it all back together, I turned it on, and on AM (light comes on, but goes off, to see what station number it's on), but for the most part, it still acts like a digtal AM/FM radio! Am I doing something wrong??? Hmmm? Help! 8-/    =Judy=
